de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class RectangleRevealAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DialogAnimation
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.RectangleRevealAnimation

  • public class RectangleRevealAnimation
extends DialogAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RectangleRevealAnimation.Builder
      A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.

        protected RectangleRevealAnimation(@NonNull
                                   android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new animation, which allows to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the animation, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
